entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then clearing. Fog patches overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Increasing cloudiness. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 16 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature steady near zero.
